item.title: iPhone 18 Could Drop Camera Control Button, Claims Dubious Rumor
item.description: This year’s upcoming iPhone 17 models could be the last of Apple’s smartphones to include a Camera Control button because not enough iPhone owners are using it, claims a questionable new rumor out of
